column1: Note: Using the Consumer Price Index (CPI) to adjust the 2003 per capita figure of $638 for inflation would yield approximately $335 in 1982 dollars. For more information on the CPI see the Bureau of Labor Statistics website <www.bls.gov>. Population figures are from the U.S. Census Bureau, Annual Population Estimates 2000 - 2005.
Population figures are from the U.S. Census Bureau, Annual Population Estimates 2000 - 2005.
